storyInfo: While unconscious, Amiya has a dream. She dreams of becoming the Lord of Fiends that destroys the world, as prophesied by Patriot. The myriad souls of the Sarkaz wish for Amiya to accept her fate, only to be met with rejection.

attributes.text: Where... am I...?
\nPain, rip, shatter.
\nEvery bit of suffering is piled upon my body, every person killed silently is myself.
\nNo, I must...
But, why can I not summon the strength?
\nSomeone seems to be urgently calling my name...
'Amiya!'
'You promised me—'
*Incoherent voices*
Is that the Doctor? I can't tell.
\nI want to reply. I try opening my mouth, just to tell the Doctor I'm fine.
The pain starts to fade away as the chaotic scene finally becomes clear.
\nI search for what strength remains in my body.
'I see cities, devastated.'
\n'I see Originium, blanketing the land.'
\n'I see you—'
The fuzzy echoes get further away as I open my eyes.

attributes.content: This is... a battlefield.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: My battlefield, the battlefield of the 'King of Sarkaz'.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: An army lies dormant behind me, silently raising their banners up high, soaked through with blood, pain and suffering...
\n...of ours... of our enemies.

attributes.content: We will take this last city. Their resistance has reached an end.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: You are... the king of the Nachzehrer Court.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What's your name?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I have no name. I am merely your loyal subject, 'King of Sarkaz'.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: This is your fate. You will bring us salvation.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: All that we fervently wish for, all that we have finally achieved... salvation.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.text: I nod slightly.
A droning cry fills the air, declaring a new chapter of destruction. The earth beneath my feet, it squirms, it curls, all because of me.
\nThis is the grace the 'Lord of Fiends' has bequeathed the lands.
\nThe formation begins advancing.

attributes.content: Your will is our will.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: You have answered the prophecy, and thus it will yield its rewards.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Please leave it to us. This battle will not drag much longer.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.text: Prophecy?
\nProphecy.
\nI once heard that...

attributes.content: You look exhausted these days.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Amiya, you can't go on like this. You need to rest.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: ...Theresa?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Is that it? I'm... exhausted?
We fought a difficult battle at the Defense Forces' control tower, with Dr. Kal'tsit taking a serious injury.
\nNorport Borough has been locked down, all its residents left for dead.
\nWe are at the tender mercies of Victoria's Catastrophes... But our military is yet to give up.
Within the Sargonian City of Gold, the Zhayedan millennium-old roars nailed shut in their coffins.
\nZwillingstürme's spires rotted and crumbling, not a tune ever to ring out again.
The eternal holy city of Laterano, its pure white cathedral dyed in black, their ancient betrayal paid in full.
\nEven under the tides... The arrogant Ægir bow their heads to me. For those still try to uphold their dignity, I claim them one by one.
In all of these, one solitary figure remains constant.
\nIs all of this my doing?

attributes.content: Is all of this... my doing?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: These are all things you need to do, Amiya.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You have come to the origin of it all.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: This is also our fated end.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.text: I feel something flowing out the edge of my eyes.
\nTheresa raises a gentle hand and wipes my tears away.

attributes.content: Don't be like this, Amiya.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: 'King of Sarkaz'. I personally placed this crown upon your head, and brought to you this pain... and glory.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: We will face it together.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: This is... the will of the myriad souls. We cannot deny it.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The more you reject it, the more you suffer. The more you resist it, the weaker you are.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.text: Theresa's face begins to blur.
\nAll of them are telling me this, all at once.
\nAcross millennia, all the Sarkaz within the myriad souls, they are all telling me this.
\nThere is no rebuke, no terror.
They just... truly wish for me to be at peace once more.

attributes.content: We have seen so much defiance of fate. Prophecies manifest early before those who defy it, and it is clear as day where they will ultimately fall.
attributes.name: Theresa?

attributes.content: We are grateful for those pointless challenges. Through their struggles they weave an ode to heroes, yet the heroes themselves are destined to perish.
attributes.name: Theresa?

attributes.content: The more you reject it, the more you suffer.
attributes.name: Theresa?

attributes.content: Because you understand. All choices, all struggles, all fatigue, the sorrow you swallow, they bear no meaning. Rejecting it only embitters the gentle hand of fate.
attributes.name: Theresa?

attributes.content: The more you resist it, the weaker you are.
attributes.name: Theresa?

attributes.content: Because you realize. All fights, all resistance, the blood we spill, our haggard words, they have no destination. Resistance only fills your destined home with thorns.
attributes.name: Theresa?

attributes.content: Why bother... why bother.
attributes.name: Theresa?

attributes.content: We only wish for you to rest.
attributes.name: Theresa?

attributes.content: Close your eyes, Amiya.
attributes.name: Theresa?

attributes.text: Close your eyes.
\nMillions of kin bow down before my rusted throne. They will bear Kazdel here.
\nThe King spurs them, the King drives them, the King enslaves them.
This is your mission. This is my mission.
\nThis is my... predestined fate.
'A good ending, is never earned.'
'This is fate. I tasted, too much.'
'I fought fate, so many years... in the end, I could not win.'
'But you... maybe you're...'
'Will you... admit it?'
'You're afraid, little King.'
'You know, my ending. You believe, all the prophecies, will be realized.'
'You will be, the origin of ruin. You will be, the harbinger of disaster.'
'You decide, you accept.'
'...Really?'
\nI—
Without exception, Amiya.
Even he, Buldrokkas'tee, succumbed to fate.
Are you stronger than him? Braver than him? Do you think those soft shoulders of yours can bear the weight of the frost and blades he's borne?
At the end of your journey, you will regret, you will suffer for your sin. Your sin of not being able to accept who you are!
Look at your hands, child. Look at your hands.
I glance down, feeling at my hands. I try curling my hands into fists.
\nIs this my will?
On the vast battlefield, I stand alone.
\nInnumerable corpses.
\nThe Black Crown hovers above her head.

attributes.content: 'I see you, black crown on your head, melting millions of lives, into nothing but memories.'
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.content: 'I see the, Lord of Fiends, enslaving all peoples, everywhere.'
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.content: You will regret.
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.content: You will fall in regret, just like me.
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.content: The final destination... is still here.
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.content: When death approaches, you will realize, that all prophecies, are inevitable.
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.content: I... am the most horrific disaster to afflict our world.
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.text: I am the most horrific disaster to afflict our world.
\nI step forward, towards Amiya, towards myself.
\nTowards fate itself.

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Black Arts weave into a sword, stabbing the Amiya in front of me.
Stabbing myself through the chest.

attributes.content: Then, I will kill you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if, you are me, you are the 'Lord of Fiends'.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I once... made the same choice as you.
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.content: I thought that I was strong enough, powerful enough to unbind myself from fate's shackles.
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.content: You can't do it.
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.content: Amiya... you can't do it.
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.content: Really.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You may have tried once, you may have faced all sorts of bitterness and still fallen into the same abyss in the end.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I haven't.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I have not walked on your so-called 'fated path'.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I will challenge you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I will challenge you, in my, the King of Sarkaz's name, 'Amiya'.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If the end of it all was set in stone long ago by those prophecies you espouse, if the meaning of our lives are just to prove your inevitable conclusion...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then why do we live?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Why do we exist?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Patriot's lifelong struggle, Dr. Kal'tsit's assiduous choices, Dr. {@nickname} holding my hand and affirming our path—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All this just to become a footnote in fate's manuscript?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I refuse to accept it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, this will only beget pain.
attributes.name: Theresa?

attributes.content: It will be, an endless torture.
attributes.name: Theresa?

attributes.content: Myriad souls of Kazdel, I ask you. Did Theresa break out of her own fate?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even Theresis, did he face you head on?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Theresa... She handed over this crown to me, for this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She didn't believe in the predestined tragic future that you paint.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So she is suffering now... Listening to our voices with nary a rest!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Myriad Souls?

attributes.content: If only to relieve her burden, 'King of Sarkaz', you must—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Myriad Souls?

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Theresa doesn't need any rescue.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The 'King of Sarkaz' will no longer be a symbol of conquest and revenge.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Maybe... that's why I must be the one.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How arrogant, how conceited—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Myriad Souls?

attributes.content: No, it is only because I have worn this black crown, that I brandish my sword at you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You cannot escape fate's choice. The further you run from it, the faster it will come—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Myriad Souls?

attributes.content: I won't run.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll wait here for it. 'Fate'.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When your plans have dissipated, when your taunts fall short.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll show you all—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We... The peoples of this great land, can choose an ending for ourselves.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: I find the strength in my body.
\nThey call this power the King of Sarkaz.
But I know, it was never about the King. This power was never meant for conquest, for subjugation.
\nIts true objective is—
\n'Survival'.
The battlefield abruptly shatters.
I hear a distant sigh.
\nIt carries no anger, no fear, no sorrow.
\nJust a sigh.
Was this a reply from the myriad souls, or... just myself sleep-talking as I awake from a nightmare?

attributes.content: Mm—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, you're awake!

attributes.text: A familiar voice beckons. I feel those lingering emotions dissipate.

attributes.content: Do you feel alright? Any pain?
You got hit by Confessarius witchcraft. Did you have a nightmare?

attributes.text: The Doctor's voice always calms me down.

attributes.content: I'm fine now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: I lift my hand, the black Arts sparking out as usual.

attributes.content: ...The 'King of Sarkaz'.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, this power is not a curse. It's not forbidden witchcraft that brings disaster.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Theresa passed it to me, so that... we can use it to find our own path.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I trust you.

attributes.text: The Doctor holds my hands tightly.

attributes.content: You're up, Amiya.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: It's fine... Logos.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Whether or not I was caught by Confessarius witchcraft, I would have had to face this... self-reflection eventually.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In my dream, those voices proclaimed the prophecy again.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Prophecy?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Yes... The prophecy The Patriot spoke of before he died.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No matter what voices they were, it's all a trick of the Confessarii.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Was that a method of Confessarius torture, or are the myriad souls still deeply connected to my heart?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Or maybe I... still hold on to that scary prophecy deep down inside.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's not important, though. I already rejected their offer.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Again.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Good.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I still want you to get a full checkup from Dr. Kal'tsit, though. Your rings...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Um, Logos, where are we though...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: The sound of footsteps approaches, it's... some Sarkaz mercenaries? They're moving a crystal shard the color of blood onto a truck not far away.
\nI recognize the girl leading them, Paprika. The Doctor said she freed the workers in Highbury.

attributes.content: Logos requisitioned the use of this Sarkaz transport squad's vehicle. In the name of the Lord of the Banshees.
We need to escape the Confessarii pursuit.
Yesterday, Closure's drones found us. W's safehouse that they were staying at were also attacked by the Confessarii, and Nightingale was captured.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: ...The Confessarii.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We let our guard down against this Sarkaz squad named after the Confessarii. Theresis's plan also allowed them freedom of movement.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: However, they've finally left the shadows they've been hiding in.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Doctor, Paprika and the others are loading the Originium samples you need on board. But they're still wary of us.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Right now, they're only listening to me because they fear me. I might have to resort to threatening them with real curses soon.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Five batches of crystals should be enough. Amiya's recovered as well.
Then, we will head to Brentwood next and meet up with Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Doctor, you look uneasy... What's worrying you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I fear that Theresis isn't looking for any sort of Vampire witchcraft device.
What he wants is... an even more unsettling power.
